thread.title: Devils' Jordin Tootoo fined for dangerous trip

author: Rich Chere | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Devils' Jordin Tootoo fined for dangerous trip
text:
John Hynes' squad will try for its first victory Friday night when the San Jose Sharks visit Pru Center. New Jersey's Jordin Tootoo has been fined $2,217.74 for a dangerous trip on Nashville's Seth Jones. â€” NHL Player Safety (@NHLPlayerSafety) October 15, 2015
